Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:3NIO10Byte.name: readData(length:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:3NIO10Byte.abstract: Read length bytes off this ByteBuffer, move the reader index forward by length bytes and return the result

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:3NIO10Byte.name: getData(at:length:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:3NIO10Byte.abstract: Return length bytes starting at index and return the result as Data. This will not change the reader index.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:3NIO10Byte.name: getString(at:length:encoding:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:3NIO10Byte.abstract: Get a String decoding length bytes starting at index with encoding. This will not change the reader index.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:3NIO10Byte.name: readString(length:encoding:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:3NIO10Byte.abstract: Read a String decoding length bytes with encoding from the readerIndex, moving the readerIndex appropriately.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:3NIO10Byte.name: writeString(_:encoding:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:3NIO10Byte.abstract: Write string into this ByteBuffer using the encoding encoding, moving the writer index forward appropriately.

Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:3NIO10Byte.name: setString(_:encoding:at:)
Extensions/ByteBuffer.html#/s:3NIO10Byte.abstract: Write string into this ByteBuffer at index using the encoding encoding. Does not move the writer index.

Enums/ByteBufferFoundationError.html#/s:.name: failedToEncodeString
Enums/ByteBufferFoundationError.html#/s:.abstract: Attempting to encode the given string failed.

Enums/ByteBufferFoundationError.html.name: ByteBufferFoundationError
Enums/ByteBufferFoundationError.html.abstract: Errors that may be thrown by ByteBuffer methods that call into Foundation.
